content: I'm thinking of visiting on a weekend, so the General Admission ticket might be the best option for me. Can you tell me more about the new single-rider line system they've implemented? I've heard it can save a lot of time, but I'm not sure how it works. By the way, have you heard about the Nighttime Lights at Hogwarts Castle show at Universal Studios Hollywood? I caught it during the "Summer Nights" festival with Rachel and Mike, and it was absolutely breathtaking!
